mapper.select: SELECT A.ADC_NO , E.NICK EMP_NO , C.CATEGORY_NAME CATEGORY_NO , A.ADC_NAME , A.ADC_CONTENT , A.ENROLL_DATE , APRVER_EMP_NO , APRVER_STATUS , AGREE_EMP_NO , AGREE_STATUS , REF_EMP_NO , REF_STATUS , A.CANCEL FROM APPROVAL_DOCU A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (A.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) JOIN APRV_CATEGORY C ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.CANCEL = 'N' AND A.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT A.ADC_NO , E.NICK EMP_NO , C.CATEGORY_NAME CATEGORY_NO , A.ADC_NAME , A.ADC_CONTENT , A.ENROLL_DATE , APRVER_EMP_NO , APRVER_STATUS , AGREE_EMP_NO , AGREE_STATUS , REF_EMP_NO , REF_STATUS , CANCEL FROM APPROVAL_DOCU A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (A.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) JOIN APRV_CATEGORY C ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.CANCEL = 'N' AND A.ADC_NO = #{adcNo}

SELECT A.ADC_NO , E.NICK EMP_NO , C.CATEGORY_NAME CATEGORY_NO , A.ADC_NAME , A.ADC_CONTENT , A.ENROLL_DATE , APRVER_EMP_NO , APRVER_STATUS , AGREE_EMP_NO , AGREE_STATUS , REF_EMP_NO , REF_STATUS , CANCEL FROM APPROVAL_DOCU A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (A.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) JOIN APRV_CATEGORY C ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.CANCEL = 'N'
